intro: Croatia has been a member of the Europe Union since 2013, but in 2023 joined the Schengen agreement so the requirements to enter Schengen zone are same as the rest of countries.
list: Passport valid for more than 3 months after date for leaving Schengen zone
Return ticket or ticket to leave Schengen zone (by flight/bus/train)
Means of support aprox. 100 EUR per person per day (minimum 1000 EUR), may be cash, debit/credit
Schengen Visa, countries like Bolivia, Cuba, Dominic Republic, Ecuador, Haiti, Jamaica require a valid Visa
Health insurance (30.000 EUR coverage is mandatory for countries where Visa Schengen is required)
Mandatory if applicable, recommended for the rest
